biography: Hugo Stiglitz is a Mexican actor. He was mostly famous in the 1970s and 1980s in Mexico after filming such film horror classics as Tintorera and La Noche de los mil gatos. He also filmed several movies in Hollywood and Italy. Quentin Tarantino paid a tribute to him, by naming a character "Hugo Stiglitz" in the movie Inglourious Basterds.
name: Hugo Stiglitz
